kuhu.parasrampuria@dal.frb.org
HPI series for Belgium contains a forecasted value for 2015Q1.
HPI series for Germany is constructed using annual data. The value for 2015Q1 represents an annual forecast that has been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
HPI series for Spain contains a forecasted value for 2015Q1.
HPI series for Finland contains a forecasted value for 2015Q1.
HPI series for Italy contains a forecasted value for 2015Q1.
HPI series for Netherlands contains backcasted values for 1975Q1-1975Q4.
HPI series for New Zealand contains a forecasted value for 2015Q1.

PDI series for Belgium is constructed using annual consumption of fixed capital data. The values for 2014 & 2015 incorporate the forecasted annual value that has been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.  The value for 2015Q1 also contains a forecasted value for gross disposable income.
PDI series for Switzerland is constructed using annual data. The values for 2013-2015 represent annual forecasts that have been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
PDI series for Denmark contains a forecasted value for 2015Q1.
PDI series for Spain contains a forecasted value for 2015Q1.
PDI series for Finland contains a forecasted value for 2015Q1.
PDI series for France incorporates a forecasted value for the consumption of fixed capital value in 2015Q1.
PDI series for U.K. incorporates a forecasted value for the consumption of fixed capital value in 2015Q1.
PDI series for Ireland contains a forecasted value for 2015Q1.
PDI series for Italy contains a forecasted value for 2015Q1.
PDI series for Japan contains forecasted values for 2014Q2-2015Q1.
PDI series for South Korea is constructed using annual data. The value for 2015Q1 represents an annual forecast that has been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
PDI series for Luxembourg is only available from 2006-2015. The remaining observations have been inferred partly with Belgian data. The series is constructed using annual data.
PDI series for Netherlands contains a forecasted value for 2015Q1.
PDI series for Sweden contains a forecasted value for 2015Q1.
PDI series for Croatia is constructed using annual data. The values for 2014 & 2015 represent annual forecasts that have been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
PDI series for Israel is constructed using annual data. The value for 2015Q1 represents an annual forecast that has been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
Forecasts used in HPI and PDI series are also used in their corresponding real counterparts (RHPI and RPDI).
